name: youtube-subtitles-downloader
description: Simple PHP implementation to download YouTube subtitles

scripts.build: echo 'No build step required for PHP project' && mkdir -p dist && cp -r . dist/ && rm -rf dist/node_modules dist/.git
scripts.start: echo 'This is a PHP project. For local development, use: php -S localhost:8000' && echo 'PHP is not available in this environment. Deploy to see the live version.'
